meanings.sent1: I caught a pomfret while fishing with my dad.
meanings.sent2: The pomfret was delicious when grilled with lemon and herbs.
meanings.sent3: The pomfret wore a tiny crown and swam around the coral reef.

meanings.sent5: The shimmering scales of the pomfret sparkled in the sunlight.
